website_summaries.verdict: Choose this band if you want to dress up your Apple Watch for special occasions, but keep it mind that it's not the best choice for everyday wear.
pros: Stainless steel bracelet band with rhinestones has an elegant, feminine look
Pairs nicely with dressy outfits and more formal occasions
cons: Not quite as durable as other bands on our shortlist
Can be a bit challenging to resize

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to dress up my new pink sands color Apple Watch series 4. It looks beautiful! The colors don’t match perfectly but it’s close enough...no one would know unless they stared at it for a few seconds in the right lighting. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Not great for people with very small wrists
customer_reviews.text: I think this band is very feminine and does a nice job of making a big watch face look less ostentatious. Especially for a person like me who has tiny wrists. I measured my wrists to make sure it was recommended and my wrist size was the smallest recommended. It works, but barely. Some days I end up needing to put in my password numerous times because the watch lost contact with my wrist. Other days it doesn’t happen at all. If the design was changed so that the decorative side links weren’t so long, it would probably work better for people like me. If it fit my dinky wrist better, it would get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: chantel vogel

customer_reviews.title: I have a nickel allergy and can wear this band
customer_reviews.text: It is super easy to adjust either for it to move about a little or I can make it snug. I have a tan line from the silicone bands so want this one to move around a bit to even out the white line. Quality so far exceeds my expectations. I am allergic to nickel and the rivets on my jeans and other metals have to be coated with clear nail polish but so far so good with this stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust size for smaller wrists.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I have very small wrists and this was easy to remove the links so it would fit. I get compliments on it all the time. It’s a nice way to make the watch look more feminine.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy K

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!!
customer_reviews.text: This watch band is absolutely beautiful! I get at least one compliment every single day. The cashier at the grocery store, a waitress at a restaurant, the nurse in the doctoe’s office, I’m talking about complete strangers! It connects and disconnects from your Apple Watch just like the band that came with the watch. It is very easy to take out links to adjust the band for a precise fit. I have already ordered a different style from this company for myself, and another of this same style for my daughter. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Iris

customer_reviews.title: Love this band, But
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful band closely matches Apple pink gold and a bonus is that you can lengthen the band easily as most links are removable. The only con comment is that it is the devil to put on by yourself, as someone else mentioned. I have learned if you open a link closer to the watch face it is easier. I would order it again as it is worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnycj

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking band but not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: I have received several compliments on this band and it was easy to fit to my wrist. However within a week of wearing it one of the stones has already come out.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnna Riedweg

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got mine today!!!! And I was worried about the fits first since I have a crazy small wrist. But being able to take off peices with just a clasp, made it so easy to get the fit right. It looks great!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tess A.

customer_reviews.title: clasp is not secure
customer_reviews.text: The clasp popped open and my watch fell on the ground, cracking the glass. thank god for apple care. DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Hall

customer_reviews.title: Thin metal attachment leaves me disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty band and easy to size yourself. However it doesn’t last. The metal connecting the watch to the band is very thin and flimsy. I have worn it for less than a month and it will separate and my watch will simply fall off my wrist. I missed my return window by 2 days. I am so disappointed it didn’t wear better because I liked it and received a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni H

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t sparkle, pretty dull looking... cheaply made. Honestly doesn’t really look like the picture. I mean it looks like it but it’s not shiny at all. I don’t think it’s worth the money personally. I feel like you could get something like this from China for about a fraction of the price
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and attention getting.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this watch band. My wife finds it to be extremely comfortable and receives positive comments every time she wears it. Most people are surprised to see an Apple Watch with such a decorative band. It is also easy to swap out whenever she needs a more athletic style. She initially had a problem with the clasp(s) not staying closed, but that was resolved by closing them a bit more firmly, to ensure they engaged completely.
customer_reviews.author: Gator

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this band about two months ago because the original band that came with the watch had started fading and changing colors PLUS I didn’t like the plain/sporty look of it. Since I have changed out my bands to this one, I have gotten so many compliments and people asking me where I got it. I wear it daily and it has not shown any wear. It has not tarnished or caused my wrist to turn green (which happens a lot with most cheap jewelry) I wash my hands often and I don’t take the watch off. This is a great quality product. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty....Very Hard To Remove
customer_reviews.text: So delighted with this very pretty band. The links changed out to make it smaller as suggested. The big problem was that after I tried it on, when I wanted to change back to my every day band...one side would absolutely not come out. I gripped the watch so hard trying to press the button and remove, that I accidentally called 911 from my watch. So, that's not happening again. Shouldn't be this hard to slide the band off. I am afraid to use again and possible damage my watch.
customer_reviews.author: Tempe H

customer_reviews.title: Great band!
customer_reviews.text: I have a rose gold 38mm Series 3 watch. I ordered the rose gold color band and there is a slight color difference - but not enough to notice unless you look very closely!! Easy to install and remove links (it was a bit too big for my wrist). The only way to put the watch on is using the clasps...and I haven't worn a clasp bracelet in years - so there is a dexterity issue that I have to get over. All in all, it is a great band and I would recommend it to anyone who wants to go a little blingy with out being too much. Very subtle, yet classy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than the Apple Watch Band
customer_reviews.text: The Apple watch band that came with the Apple watch made my wrist feel hot and sweaty. Also, my band was white and very casual, which didn't always look good with what I was wearing. I wanted a metal band that looked attractive and was more "breathable." This band is just what I was looking for. It is not hard to figure out how to adjust the size, nor is it difficult to put on and take off. It was also easy to attach to the watch.
customer_reviews.author: TSPOON

customer_reviews.title: Beauty & Functionality Until 8 Months Later😡
customer_reviews.text: The previous review is being updated Aug 14,2020 I purchased this band Jan 24, 2020. I was thrilled with it and alternated it with other bands. 8 months later, the rose gold coloring is coming off in droves. I am not happy. Updated photos have been posted. I will not be ordering another band as I had originally planned. Original Review is below: This watchband is elegant and functional for day and evening wear. I don’t like the silicon band that comes with the Apple watch and this one fits the bill with a chic design and durability. I also wear it while doing various exercises. Excellent - will order another in black for my next watch.
customer_reviews.author: Lark Logan

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous watch band
customer_reviews.text: Love this band. This is the second one I’ve purchased. The first was a pink to match my old watch, this was silver for the new. Very easy to adjust. No watch makers kits needed. It stayed on and secure, in fact sometimes I have difficulty getting the watch off, which pleases me as I wouldn’t want it to randomly open and fall off throughout the day. I’ve gotten tons of complements on the design. I don’t know why Apple hasn’t made anything along these lines and design, but I’m more than happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Rice

customer_reviews.title: Elegant & Perfect Rose Gold Match
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this band. I’ve been wanting something like this for quite a while but didn’t want to spend the coins on the ones I’ve seen. So happy I took a chance on this one. It matches my rose gold Apple Watch perfectly and has the elegant dainty lady like look I wanted for dressier occasions. Although I may not wear those silicone bands much at all anymore. Lol. It was also super easy to adjust the length by taking off two links.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: 100% worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this band! it's got some weight to it but that actually balances it out since the apple watch itself isn't very light. I haven't gotten the watch and band wet yet so I cannot comment on how it will hold up once submerged but it is very pretty and matches the gold series 3 apple watch color almost PERFECTLY! Also, the band comes with many links and is adjustable for many sizes. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RegalBreeze

customer_reviews.title: Beutiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty watch band and it makes my apple watch look more professional. I had another one I had ordered and the rose gold color started to peel off so we will see how this one goes. The only complaint I have is that although you can remove links, I can't get it exactly how I like it. It is either too tight or I need to push up up from my wrist a little with the extra link it it to make it fit so it is not flopping around.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Easy to resize
customer_reviews.text: I waited a month before writing this review to make sure I put it to good use before reviewing it. I bought this band to jazz up my Apple Watch. I love how it’s dainty and yet not so flashy. The metal has a dull shine to it almost like a nickel finish. The band was very easy to resize. Each clasp is a hook clip that you can just keep removing and then just clip on the part where it fits you best. No tools needed, yay! I’ve been using this band everyday. I’ve gotten quite a few compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: TeenaG

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but hard to fit
customer_reviews.text: The color is great, matches my iphone rose gold watch perfectly. I'm not used to wearing a watch so it feels a bit bulky. had to remove most of the links because i have a small wrist. the watch is so heavy, that without a snug fit it flops around. i think I prefer the silicone band that came with the watch a bit better, but was looking for something that will allow my wrist to "breath". I'm keeping and will use for dressy occasion.
customer_reviews.author: LVGal

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, fits perfectly (minus three links)
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wristband. I use it with a silver, rhinestone-studded metal bumper (watch cover) that makes the watch a piece of jewelry. Much more feminine and to my liking for daily wear and not too bling-y as to be gaudy. I removed three links (so easy to do), and it fits like it was made for my wrist. I've only worn it for a week, but so far it's holding up nicely. The only "negative" that prevents a 5-star rating is that one hinge, where one slides the insert into the watch, is looser than the other. I am keeping an eye on that to be sure it doesn't come apart.
customer_reviews.author: ShawnB in North Hills

customer_reviews.title: Gives the uni-sex Apple watch a bit of delicate dressiness
customer_reviews.text: It is so easy to put on, and makes me feel pretty, so I just wear it every day. Two drawbacks: 1. While it is easy to size it and the change the size back and forth, the incremental difference of adding a link or taking one away, is enough of a difference for me that I am never quite satisfied that I got it right. It is either a big snug or too loose, but only by a smidgen, and that's why I keep happily wearing it. 2. My mom insisted I help her get one just like it as soon as she saw mine.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: I get so many compliments
customer_reviews.text: First off, I've had a band just like this that I bought on Amazon, for years. The first one lasted a while, but some of the little side stones fell out so I decided to buy a new one. For the price, you can't beat how good it looks. I also have sensitive skin but have never reacted to this. It's comfortable enough to wear 24/7 and people ask me about it all the time because it looks so nice. I highly recommend this Apple Watch band!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have received too many compliments to count regarding this watch band! It is stylish and comfortable. The color matches flawlessly with my Apple Watch, it was easily adjustable to fit my wrist, and I haven’t had any issues with skin irritation like other watch bands I’ve tried. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lori0104

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: For the regular price of this to be 27.99 I think that’s a little extreme. But if the lightening deal is their then I would definitely suggest this! It’s cute but feels a little cheaply made. I only had it a day and it’s been good so far. Hopefully it lasts. It’s a little big on me but even if I take out another lock it’s too tight so I wish they had tinier ones. Other than that the color is pretty and it looks fancy and better then the silicone ones.
customer_reviews.author: KailaN

customer_reviews.title: Get so many compliments on it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this band and get so many compliments on it! It's dainty, and gives a feminine look to an otherwise large and clunky Apple watch. I've been wearing it daily for a couple of months now and it's still shiny, all the stones are in place, and looks great. It was very easy to remove the extra links to make it snug for my skinny wrist. I also have sensitive skin (cheap metals will give me a rash) and this causes no problems and is very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: It catches on clothing and rips holes
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me for my rose gold Apple Watch and it looks beautiful.. the only thing I do not like is that certain parts of the band is rough and tends to catch on clothing and will rip HOLES. I have ruined many shirts already. I just wear this on special occasions because it does look prettier than a rubber watch band.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Bacchus

customer_reviews.title: Great customer care and beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Matches my rose gold series 5 watch very well! I was disappointed within the first month and a half 2 of the gems fell off but I contacted the manufacturer and they replaced my watch and had it shipped to me within a week! It’s a gorgeous watch and I get so many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kodi

customer_reviews.title: Stylist
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, easy to attach to the watch, but very difficult to on your wrist, or take off. They clasp is very difficult to work. Not the type - I’ve had those before without a problem, so it’s something about this particular design. However, it does make your watch look more like a watch and less like a hunk of tech on your arm.
customer_reviews.author: Cooking42

customer_reviews.title: Paint chipping after 4 wears
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE!!! So I have only worn about 4 times, to work (desk job), and the paint is already coming off. Really disappointed :(. New photo added to show. So cute! Feels like it’s a well made quality product. Extremely easy to remove or add links. Love love love!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Salomon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty without being over blingy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a band that was feminine but not overly blingy so I could wear it for work. This band is perfect for that! I had purchased a different brand prior to this one that looked almost the same but the clasps were thinner. I like that this one has a bit wider clasp(s) because it provides a more balanced look to the entire watch. Now I have to see how long it lasts - my old one lasted a little less than a year before it started looking shabby. Honestly, it's so inexpensive, I don't really mind buying a new one every year.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Kozuch

customer_reviews.title: Cute. Color does fade.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the band, it was exactly as the picture shows. You are able to take links off, which is great because I have a smaller wrist. The only issues I have with it are it is a little tricky to get off by yourself, but definitely possible, and also I haven’t even had it for a month yet and the color is already started to fade off the links. I do wear it every day for literally the entire day, so maybe that’s why the color is fading already.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Rankine

customer_reviews.title: This is the band I love.
customer_reviews.text: Finally! a band that looks great, is elegant and NOT bulky. Also, super easy to fit to my small wrist, because every link has an easy to open and close clasp. I got my Apple Watch a month ago. I have bought 5 bands. 2 were too bulky. A third one (mesh) went into the trash after one week because it was falling apart and snagging everything it touched. My other one has bling and is for dressing up. This one is my favorite and the one I will wear daily. Great product and beautiful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia F

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice!?!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sooo much, I get a ton of compliments! I shower, swim & everything with it & have had no issues or discoloring. People tell me that I shouldn’t let others know it’s from Amazon & that I should say it’s white gold with diamonds because it definitely looks like it could be! lol
customer_reviews.author: Teresa CelestialHealings

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of the band, but don't care for the faux stones, as they make the band look cheap. Also, the paint started chipping after just a couple of months. For the price, I expected better quality, especially considering the number of bands available on the market that is priced much less. I would not recommend this product - not at this price point. Maybe if it's priced below $10.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Interesting color - not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: This watch came VERY big and I took out several pieces to make it smaller. It was a choice between take out one more and have it super tight, or leave it in and the watch wiggles too much. So I took it out and the band is very tight. It is much dressier than normal plastic bands so I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber G.

customer_reviews.title: Tons of compliments
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten one of these before but I changed watch sizes so ordered a new one for new watch, don't expect anything else different. Its well made and holds watch nicely, love the clasp removal option or lengthening options. Always get tons of compliments on my watchband. I've had so many people ask where I got it or if it's expensive and I happily tell them where and how much.
customer_reviews.author: Soozett

customer_reviews.title: So many compliments
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on Cyber Monday deals and have worn it for 10 months. Amazing thing is that people with Apple watches don't really look at getting a different band, but they notice that mine is different and like it a lot. Its attractive and makes me feel a little more like a regular women's watch instead of a square phone alternative on my wrist. Quality is decent for what I paid (its lasted this long with a few scratches). With the design, you can adjust to the length you want. My wrist was kind of between two linkages in size, but I got used to it slightly big. Its just different than the velcro super adjustable band in that way.
customer_reviews.author: S Hagin

customer_reviews.title: Great band but color peels
customer_reviews.text: I love this band, it’s so beautiful yet, not very durable. The first band I receive the color started to peel. I received a new one and so far the color hasn’t peeled yet, we’ll have to see this time. I guess is just what you pay for. Great purchase regardless. **Update** New band I received is starting to peel as well. Oh well, it’s still a pretty band.
customer_reviews.author: IReviewIt

customer_reviews.title: Stylish but secure watch band.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice band. Like that it is really easynto remove links to size to your wrist. Everybody has noticed my new band and commented on how nice it is. They think it is really fancy. It beats the drab silico9bands that come with the apple watch. I highly recommend this band. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: elspikey

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, good customer service
customer_reviews.text: The rose gold color matches my Series 2 watch perfectly. The band is a little tighter than I’d prefer after removing two links but it just takes some getting used to. BUT, after just a little over a month, the pin holding the band to the connector piece broke! It was too late for me to return through Amazon, but Seller’s customer service was great. They addressed my complaint immediately, acknowledged their warranty, and sent me a new band straight away. I remain very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Beware: Will not match Rose Gold Series 3.  Different shade...
customer_reviews.text: This does not match the gold rose series 3. It matches the rose gold series 1 and 2 only. This would be helpful if they put it in their description but now I have to waste my time and return this.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the durability and the way it looks. But I have a small wrist. I took out Four links, and it’s still slightly loose. But I absolutely love the band. I’ve had it for 3months now, and thinking of buying a spare one. The color hasn’t faded , the diamond studs havnt fallen out and I don’t break out. I’ve gotten a lot of compliments on it. A must have
customer_reviews.author: Linda delp

customer_reviews.title: Quality Apple Watch bands
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with the quality of the band purchased for my wife's new Apple Watch Series 4. Comparable to the $100+ OEM bands from Apple. Elegant styling without being over the top. Feels quality and she can be fashionable without a huge price tag. Recommended buy!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Buckner

customer_reviews.title: Liked but I have small wrists
customer_reviews.text: I loved this however my wrist is to small. I removed like 4 links and only three links were left and it fit but was so tight on my wrist. It is very pretty so I would give it a try and see if it fits your wrist size. looks very professional!
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Not convenient for day to day wear
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this band but I have a serious issue with the fact that there isn’t an actual clasp on the watch band. The links do unclip so it’s easy to remove links but I don’t feel like it’s convenient to put on day to day. I plan to use this as a dress band for nicer occasions... but I’ll probably keep my activity band on day to day. It looks nice, but I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Works for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and get compliments. The link sizes are not okay for me, so it does fit loose. I don’t rely on this band to track fitness. I use is for work so it does meet my needs and looks much better than the apple bands when you are in a professional setting.
customer_reviews.author: Edward E.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Have previously been disappointed by other stylish bands purchased for my wife’s Apple watch, but this one is really well made as well as attractive. Changing the size to fit her wrist was super easy. A little more challenging to remove than some other bands but on the plus side this means it won’t come off accidentally.
customer_reviews.author: George Pytlik

customer_reviews.title: Great Watchband
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch band. I am able to handle putting it on and taking off by myself and it looks very nice. Easy to adjust. I am adding to my previous review to say that I have had three people in the last two days compliment me on this watchband and ask where I bought it. Obviously, it looks nice too.
customer_reviews.author: vabeach42

customer_reviews.title: Awkward
customer_reviews.text: This band was awkward. The clasp is not easy to open or close. It does not sit securely on my wrist. It might be great for a lady with larger wrists. My wrists are very small. It is very pretty, but I wish I had returned it last week before the return period ended. I like the leather band much better.
customer_reviews.author: kevin e cahill

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful band that brings down the bulkiness of the Apple Watch.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I was hesitant to purchase and Apple Watch due to how bulky and square the face is. I wanted something more feminine to match my style. I own an iPhone and read that other watches such as the Kate Spade Scallop and the Michael Kors Smartwatch were not compatible with iOS. Disappointed, I started looking into possible alternatives. I purchased this band alone with my Apple Watch 3 series and was very pleased with the wearability and quality of the metal. It is very easy to adjust and fits my wrist perfectly. I like to switch it out with the band it came with when working out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this band!
customer_reviews.text: Color matches perfectly with the rose gold watch. Removing links is easy but I chipped my nail then used the side of a plastic measuring spoon instead and it worked very well. Just started using it today so I cannot comment on durability. Fit is perfect. Love it! Update on durability - it’s been almost 2 years and the band still looks great! There is no color fade at all. This is the best non-Apple band I’ve had so far; others lasted only a few months before they broke down from wear. I highly recommend this band.
customer_reviews.author: Paula S

customer_reviews.title: Will fit a very small wrist & looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: adjustable enough to fit my very small wrist(fits my 5.5” wrist) ; attractive, with a little bling but not over the top and comfortable Cons: none so far. If there are any durability issues, I’ll update my review. Bottom line: attractive watch band that’s easy to adjust for size & comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Howdy

customer_reviews.title: Great product for an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for times when I don’t want to wear the sport band, particularly for my sister’s wedding. It matches the style of my wedding ring perfectly. I love it! I was worried that for such a good price, the quality would be lacking, but it is beautiful. The apple sport band is more comfortable in my opinion because I can wear it with a snugger fit. This one dangles a little, but if I take out a notch, the metal digs in to my wrist... but honestly, I think that is to be expected with this style band. Great product for an affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Ray and Christine Bertrand

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Simple yet has some bling.
customer_reviews.text: Needed to dress up my watch for a wedding. I wanted just a little bling. This was perfect. Easy to take out links. Will probably not wear it daily but will use it when I want to dress up a bit. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: QMarsha

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open and close
customer_reviews.text: This watch band is not what I expected at all. I like most everything from amazon however this is way too hard to open and close . The rose gold is off color from the Apple Watch and not even pretty. Sorry
customer_reviews.author: peggy

customer_reviews.title: Purchase the Champagne Gold and it matches my watch perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch band - easy to size down - only one small problem - my wrist is pretty small and I had to remove all the removable links (now it fits wonderfully) - if you have extremely small wrists, you might not be able to make it small enough
customer_reviews.author: cam

customer_reviews.title: Finally makes the Apple Watch look feminine!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great! Very well made and easily adjusted to almost any wrist. I have a larger wrist and still had to take out two links. It is a little loose yet but that is how I want it. I can size it down enough to fit my 5 year old. Highly recommend. Dresses up your watch for nicer outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah N

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Received this item on May 30, and already today, 11 days later, the paint color has chipped off next to the stones on one side. I am sending it back for replacement because I really love the way it looks and I’ve gotten many compliments on it. But so far not very durable.
customer_reviews.author: PA Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Clasps start loosening...
customer_reviews.text: Had the product for a year now. The color was great and as expected. By the 6 month mark of everyday wear the paint is scratching off and noticeable. It has a brassy undertone so doesn’t stand out too much. By 9 months though the clasps easily pop and I have lost it once or twice now and barely noticed it. Eeek... still prefer over metal magnetic mesh band which retains water more easily.
customer_reviews.author: C.C Webb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful band
customer_reviews.text: I love it, but even on the smallest size, my wrist is too small for an accurate ECG reading. I did not realize just how scrawny and small my wrist was until I took the band off and looked at the closed band!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: It’s beautiful, comfortable and perfectly adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an alternative to the original band to my new iwatch and I love that you can take off the links so you can adjust it. The clasps are easy to use just like a watch band. The color doesn’t exactly match but it’s still a pretty color and the stones are nice and well secured.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Lugo

customer_reviews.title: This isn’t just a band this is a piece of jewelry
customer_reviews.text: This band is perfect. It matches my watch in color perfectly, it is classy and elegant. I definitely have the prettiest watch at my work. I am very satisfied with everything about this band. It’s just so dainty and makes my watch look like jewelry instead of how the traditional bands look, which is purely functional.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Love this and get a ton of compliments anytime I wear it. It is starting to chip a bit underneath, but no one is that close to see it but me. The color is a tad off since I have the gold version 3, but it is not that noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Faith C.

customer_reviews.title: Gold match matches my watch PERFECTLY
customer_reviews.text: I only gave four stars because it doesn’t get small enough for me. I don’t blame the band at all considering my just a tiny person. The band is beautiful and I still love it. I don’t wear it when I want to get accurate readings of my heart rate and such for exercising since I can’t ge tit tight enough. If you have normal size wrists, I’m sure this band will be perfect for all the time. Very beautiful
customer_reviews.author: darloa

customer_reviews.title: Very fashionable
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Very dainty and fashionable compared to the others in the market for the Apple Watch. Adjustable. Only negative is it doesn’t fit snug on my wrist so I can’t get an accurate reading on the ECG or heart rate monitor. It flops around on my small wrist a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Angela C

customer_reviews.title: Many complements from my patients
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Looks very pretty and classy on top and sides. Easy to remove or add links for fit. Cons: Difficult to latch. Tough to get it on if you are in a hurry. Finish gets worn off quickly on the bottom side where clasp is. For the price I will buy another when this one gets too worn. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Pleased With Gold Watch Band
customer_reviews.text: I have a Series 1 watch, champagne gold. The Secbolt gold watch band matches very well and looks more stylish than the original silicone one that came with the watch. I finally got around to getting something nicer and I’m pleased with the results. Giving it only 4 stars since I’ve just started wearing it; I cannot yet address how it will hold up but it appears solid.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Love this dressy watchband!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and I have received sooooooo many compliments on it! Every link has a clasp on it so it is easy to put on, easy to take off, and easy to take links out to make it smaller if need be. I absolutely love this band and would highly recommend it to anyone who wants a fancier band!
customer_reviews.author: Genny Lauck

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a relatively good looking band for the price I paid. This is beautiful. I got it in the gold and it matches the color tone perfectly. The "crystals" look real whatever it is. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Grant G.

customer_reviews.title: Rose gold coating doesn’t hold up under every day wear.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, but I’ve only had it a short time and the "rose gold" is peeling off, showing gray stuff underneath. That part isn’t pretty. I would use it only for an occasional dress up night, not every day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Labrat1

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to adjust, looks like jewelry
customer_reviews.text: This is much easier to adjust for my small wrist than any of the other “bling-y” bands I’ve bought. No need to pop out links with a pin or crappy little tool. Each link is a clasp, so you just unfasten the clasps on a few and pull them out. Also super accurately made do it fits into my Apple Watch perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: d-unit

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Was a little concerned how cheesy the bling on the side would be...but it’s not very noticeable. Love that it looks like a bracelet. This is the primary band I use everyday and the clasps are staying nice and tight
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer 123

customer_reviews.title: GENIUS!!  Each link is a clasp!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS BAND !! It’s pretty and feminine and EACH LINK IS A CLASP! So it’s so convenient to take it off and to clasp it back on! GENIUS!! Why hasn’t anyone done this till now?? THANKS FOR THINKING OF IT NOW!
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Avery-Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Nice band but color doesn’t quite match watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this band because my friend had it and it looked really nice on her Apple Watch. However, when mine arrived, the color was slightly different than my gold-tone watch...just a shade too pink. It was confusing to me to try to figure out which of the golds to choose to go with which of the watch models. I still wear it but I’m not as happy with it as I’d hoped to be.
customer_reviews.author: PJCool

customer_reviews.title: Nice band!
customer_reviews.text: The color could have matched the gold Apple Watch better, but other than that, it’s very nice. Not quite as shiny as it appears in the picture. Links are easy to remove or add back, with no tools. Overall, I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly comfortable and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my wife and she said it’s now her going out band since it looks so nice. I honestly wanted to know myself how she would like it so put it on her and adjusted it myself while she was dealing with baby and after about 30 min I asked how it felt and she didn’t even notice I switched the back from the original! Definitely a nice upgrade
customer_reviews.author: Mike & Jen

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: It pretty, but not what I expected. It’s a lot harder to put on and take off than the regular sports band that the watch comes with. I guess I didn’t look into that part of it before buying. Also, it looks sort of poorly made for the price that it’s selling at. I’m not one to write bad reviews, but it just looked a bit cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Misskbee

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it, worn every day since Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Wife can be hard to buy for. The band makes the watch look a little less clunky and big. It’s holding up exceptionally well to everywpday use. She pays tennis, and goes out dressed up with it. Loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Smlbound

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: I love how you can remove any of the links to make this tighter and fit you perfectly! Feels comfortable and works great. No skin discoloration or irritations. Was easy to install on my iwatch5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too broad
customer_reviews.text: When seeing this on Amazon it looks classy and delicate. Sadly, when it arrived, it was the size/thickness of a man's watchband. So, if you're a guy who's into crossdressing, this will probably look great on you. As a woman, I was looking for a band that didn't look large and clunky on my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Mistress Collette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Match for my Apple Watch.
customer_reviews.text: Love updating my Apple Watch to a classy look with style. Good quality and price for this lovely band. Rose gold is perfect match for the Apple Watch. Adjuothe band was simple to do as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Maher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Apple Watch band
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved it and it looks great on her. Jewels appear to be fastened very well as well as a rugged design. I highly recommend if you are looking for a good watch band with some bling-bling.
customer_reviews.author: John Ingalls

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Love this band. So pretty. I only wear it occasionally but it’s held up really well. I ended up submerging it in water once and I was impressed that it didn’t rust. Beautiful color and just enough bling.
customer_reviews.author: mrcrooks

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy it,,, don't even think about it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend and both of us could not be more happy it is absolutely fantastic well built and looks awesome easy to change bam size which came in handy cause she has a very small wrist and still fits her great... Thank you very much and I definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.author: trey crawford

customer_reviews.title: Good Length
customer_reviews.text: Love the stainless steel against the aluminum watch, it does not match exactly but I’m OK with that. Band is not polished stainless steel but X design is. Very easy to remove links, I removed 3 and may remove another. I’ve had for 2 days and so far it seems durable. Has lots of compliments. Will order another style.
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly SA

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very secure, pretty, easy to get on and off, I did put clear nail polish over crystals and can’t tell but haven’t lost any crystals, I very high acid in skin, been wearing for a few months now and it’s still like the day I received it. Love it and I get many compliments
customer_reviews.author: sheri l. williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: After hunting all over to find a band to match my Apple Watch 4 that was listed as gold (it's not gold, it's a VERY deep rose gold.) No golds matched, and most rose golds were too shiny or too pale. This band was a perfect match.
customer_reviews.author: KC417

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Did not realize there wasn’t a clasp and the pin that needed to be removed in order to remove links wasn’t inserted on end so I had trouble getting links out then could not get on wrist because there wasn’t a clasp to open my fault should have liked closer. Very pretty though
customer_reviews.author: Kristine J.

customer_reviews.title: Cute functional band
customer_reviews.text: I really like this band. It’s an elegant way to upgrade your Apple Watch. I also found the links really easy to remove and now it fits perfectly even though I have super small wrists. It’s cute and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Nice Band
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace my Apple Watch band and this just looked perfect. So far no complaints. It came quickly in the mail, was easy to switch out with old band and very easy to adjust to a comfortable fit on my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: NJ Mom

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty and durable.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this band for nearly a year now and it is wonderful. I've never had a problem with it breaking. I get lots of compliments on it as well. It makes the watch look classier.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stoeffler

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, Affordable, High Quality, Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This band is extremely easy to attach to watch and custom size it. Each link opens so taking it off and on is very easy. The quality of this band looks and feels like one that would come on a watch that cost hundreds. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and I love it! It looks much more expensive than it is. Only complaint is that the packaging looks really cheap so I had to repackage it and buy a box for it so that it would look presentable as a gift. Otherwise recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Adjusts To The Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a band that would soften the look of the Apple Watch and still be secure. This band did both. I have a very small wrist that often falls between sizes of this type of band but this style fit perfectly so the watch does not slide.
customer_reviews.author: Scubagirl

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Found it didn’t slide in and out of my watch bits to my liking. Given how much these watches cost, I’m not going to try cramming this if it doesn’t fit well. Also found it inconvenient to put on and take off. Didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amber V.

customer_reviews.title: After nine months the links don’t stay closed
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and less bulky than many other bands. I’ve had many compliments. Nine months on and the links don’t stay closed. Sadly I will stop using this band. The watch has fallen off three times in the past week. Luckily I noticed it each time so I still have the watch. If you are only going to use it rarely for dressed up moments this may be right for you. Very attractive on the wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J

product_meta.title: Secbolt Stainless Steel Band Compatible Apple Watch Band 38mm 40mm Women Iwatch Series 5/4/3/2/1 Accessories Metal Wristband X-Link Sport Strap, Silver
feature_bullets: Material: High quality stainless steel metal not an inexpensive zinc or aluminum alloy make it a sleek daily companion. Suitable for 5.5-8.1 inch wrists.

Design: Slim and elegant to compliment a slender wrist, this Apple Watch band 38mm is set with rhinestones that sparkle. Iwatch bands 38mm womens will give your look a big boost with its thin and airy appearance.
EASY TO RESIZE: Six folding clasps in each band mean a perfect fit for maximum comfort. Simply remove a folding clasp to resize the band, no tools needed!

Compatibility: Fits all Apple Watch models including Apple Watch band 38mm 40mm Series 5 (2019), Series 4 (2018), Series 3 (2017), Series 2 (2016), and Series 1 (2015) making it a great gift for Apple Watch lovers. (Watch band only. No Apple Watch. No metal case.)
1-year warranty for a full refund or replacement without the need to return anything. Order your Iwatch bands 38mm with absolute confidence.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,929 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
